Class EmailService

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.binfo.services.EmailService

  • @Service(value="emailService")
public class EmailService
extends java.lang.Object
    A class with methods to handle emails so far it can only handle gmail.

    Stonie

      • generateAndSendEmail

        public void generateAndSendEmail(java.lang.String To,
                                 java.lang.String Subject,
                                 java.lang.String Body,
                                 java.lang.String user,
                                 java.lang.String password)
        A simple method to send emails using Gmail using param user and password to login
        Parameters:
        To - The email we should send to
        Subject - The subject of the email
        Body - The body of the email, you can use html tags like
        user - The username used to login to gmail
        password - The password used to login to gmail
